class_notes: Synchronous class attendance required. Timed, asynchronous assessments. Technology required: webcam, microphone, ability to scan written work. This course includes 1-credit worth of supplemental asynchronous content and activities.
course_description: This course introduces students to the foundations of linguistics, including syntax, phonology, morphology, orthography, language acquisition, language processing, neurolinguistics and sociolinguistics.
